import React, {useState} from "react"; import '../style/sort.css' const Sort = ({ onSort }) => { const [divDisplayStyle, setDivDisplayStyle] = useState('none'); const [sortKey, setSortKey] = useState('Title'); const handleSearchKey = (event) => { setSortKey(event.target.innerHTML) handleButtonClick(); } const handleButtonClick = () => { setDivDisplayStyle(divDisplayStyle === 'block' ? 'none' : 'block'); }; return (
Sort by

Title

); } export default Sort;
